note.p: Obituaries: Obituary Notices of Fellows of the Royal Society 1942-1944 vol 4 pp 167-182, plate, by Harold Hartley
References: Edmund J Bowen, 'The Balliol-Trinity Laboratories, Oxford 1853-1940' in NR 1970 vol 25 pp 227-236
Notes: Scientific papers held by Trustees of the Berkeley Castle Muniments, c/o Gloucestershire Record Office, Clarence Row, Alvin Street, Gloucester, GL1 3DW
